Reviews.Title: 500 Ft Rg59 Siamese Cable Cctv Cable
Reviews.Author: S. Howard
Reviews.Content: I installed a PTZ camera with a 140' of this cable.  The picture quality is excellent!  I highly recommend this cable. Great price

Reviews.Title: Quality cable
Reviews.Author: BK63 "bklosens"
Reviews.Content: I had to wire my house for a dvr and cameras and 500 feet was going to be plenty for 8 cameras.  The pre made cables you can buy are junk.  This cable came quickly in a box on a spool that spins inside the box making it easy to run.  The cable is of good quality.

ProductInfo.Features:
RG59 Siamese Solid Coaxial Cable + 18/2 (18AWG 2C) Power, Black, 500ft, Pullbox
UL-Listed Solid Copper conductor
ProductInfo.Name: 500 Ft Rg59 Siamese Cable Cctv Cable
